articles.title: Fuel Prices Hiked For Fourth Straight Day; Petrol Touches New High Of Rs. 102.39/Litre In Delhi - carandbike
articles.description: Petrol prices in Delhi stand at Rs.102.39 per litre, witnessing a hike of 25 paise, while diesel rates went up by 30 paise, currently standing at Rs. 90.77 per litre.
articles.content: The state-run oil marketing companies (OMCs) on Sunday hiked fuel prices for the fourth consecutive day. With the latest price, petrol and diesel prices have touched new all-time highs across the cou… [+2655 chars]
